name: Game-Of-Hardcore-Mining-Chance
description:
You mine,
You meditate,
You pay taxes.

Try to get the best score and stay above the taxes, and try to " Special Mine" if ya can.

:notes: I will add a dungeon one day to this for you to enjoy battling as well
however for now, it's just only hardcore and mining and meditation.

:additional notes: I may add a char editor as in stats etc. nothing visual.
This is a hardcore game there is no save from session to session.
